minions.name: Steam Queen
minions.description: Ongoing: Your actions are not affected by other players' cards

minions.name: Mechanic
minions.description: Choose an action in your discard pile that can be played on a base and play it as an extra action

minions.name: Steam Man
minions.description: Ongoing: Has +1 power if this base has one of your actions played on it

minions.name: Captain Ahab
minions.description: Talent: Move this minion to a base that has one of your actions played on it

actions.name: Scrap Diving
actions.description: Place an action from your discard pile into your hand

actions.name: Zeppelin
actions.description: Play on a base. Talent: Move one of your minions from another base to here, or from here to another base

actions.name: Aggromotive
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: If you have a minion here, you have +5 power here

actions.name: Change of Venue
actions.description: Place one of your actions that is on a base or minion into your hand. Play it again as an extra action

actions.name: Difference Engine
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: If you have a minion here, draw an extra card at the end of your turn

actions.name: Escape Hatch
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: When your minions here are destroyed, place them into your hand instead of the discard pile

actions.name: Ornate Dome
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: Destroy all other players' actions played here. Ongoing: Other players cannot play actions on this base

actions.name: Rotary Slug Thrower
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions here each have +2 power
